(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB seldom))
    (VP (VB rave)
      (PP (IN about)
        (NP (NNS dessets))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(rave-3, I-1)
advmod(rave-3, seldom-2)
root(ROOT-0, rave-3)
prep(rave-3, about-4)
pobj(about-4, dessets-5)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (VP (VBG going)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB rave)
              (NP (RB about) (DT the) (NN ice) (NN cream))
              (ADVP (RB here))
              (PP (IN because)
                (NP
                  (NP (PRP$ its))
                  (VP (VBN been)
                    (ADVP (RB awhile)
                      (SBAR (IN since)
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP I))
                          (VP (VBD was)
                            (VP (VBN bowled)
                              (PRT (RP over))
                              (PP (IN by)
                                (NP (DT an) (NN ice) (NN cream))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(going-4, But-1)
nsubj(going-4, I-2)
aux(going-4, am-3)
root(ROOT-0, going-4)
aux(rave-6, to-5)
xcomp(going-4, rave-6)
advmod(cream-10, about-7)
det(cream-10, the-8)
nn(cream-10, ice-9)
dobj(rave-6, cream-10)
advmod(rave-6, here-11)
prep(rave-6, because-12)
pobj(because-12, its-13)
partmod(its-13, been-14)
advmod(been-14, awhile-15)
mark(bowled-19, since-16)
nsubjpass(bowled-19, I-17)
auxpass(bowled-19, was-18)
dep(awhile-15, bowled-19)
prt(bowled-19, over-20)
prep(bowled-19, by-21)
det(cream-24, an-22)
nn(cream-24, ice-23)
pobj(by-21, cream-24)

        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NNS people))
          (VP (VBP are)

                (NP (PRP$ their) (NN food))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (SBAR
      (WHADVP (WRB When))
      (S

              (NP (JJ such) (NN passion)))))))

    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT an) (JJ indelible) (NN quality))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ manifests)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NN tongue) (VBG tingling) (NN delight))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBG going)
            (PP (IN around)
              (S
                (VP (VBG looking)
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (JJ ultimate) (NNP Black) (NNP Sesame) (NNP Paste))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NNP Singapore))
                          (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                            (NP (JJ hot) (NN soup) (NN version))
                            (-RRB- -RRB-))))))))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBP have)
        (ADVP (RB so) (RB far))
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBN dissappointed)))))
    (. .)))

    (. .)))

                (ADVP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN receipe))

        (VP (VB enjoy)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNS fruits))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Eunice) (POS 's))
                (NN labor)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(sit-4, I-1)
aux(sit-4, will-2)
advmod(sit-4, just-3)
root(ROOT-0, sit-4)
advmod(sit-4, back-5)
cc(sit-4, and-6)
conj(sit-4, enjoy-7)
det(fruits-9, the-8)
dobj(enjoy-7, fruits-9)
prep(fruits-9, of-10)
poss(labor-13, Eunice-11)
possessive(Eunice-11, 's-12)
pobj(of-10, labor-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Black) (NNP Sesame))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ absolute) (NN favorite)))
    (. .)))


nn(Sesame-2, Black-1)
nsubj(favorite-6, Sesame-2)
cop(favorite-6, is-3)
poss(favorite-6, my-4)
amod(favorite-6, absolute-5)
root(ROOT-0, favorite-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Liverpool))
    (VP (VBZ swears)
      (PP (IN by)
        (NP (DT the) (NNP Apple) (NNP Pie))))
    (, ,)))

root(ROOT-0, swears-2)
prep(swears-2, by-3)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN iwatch_ueat))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB die)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (DT the) (NN chocolate)))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S (CC and)
    (NP
      (NP (RB even) (JJ smart))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP who))
        (S
          (VP (VBZ needs)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB cut)
                  (PRT (RP down))
                  (PP (IN on)
                    (NP (NN sugar))))))))))
    (VP (MD could) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB resist)
        (S
          (VP (VBG taking)
            (ADVP (RBR more) (RB then))
            (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NN mouthful))))))
    (. .)))


cc(resist-13, and-1)
advmod(smart-3, even-2)
nsubj(resist-13, smart-3)
nsubj(needs-5, who-4)
rcmod(smart-3, needs-5)
aux(cut-7, to-6)
xcomp(needs-5, cut-7)
prt(cut-7, down-8)
prep(cut-7, on-9)
pobj(on-9, sugar-10)
aux(resist-13, could-11)
neg(resist-13, n't-12)
root(ROOT-0, resist-13)
xcomp(resist-13, taking-14)
advmod(then-16, more-15)
advmod(taking-14, then-16)
det(mouthful-19, a-17)
amod(mouthful-19, few-18)
dobj(taking-14, mouthful-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Enough))
    (VP (VBD said))
    (. .)))


nsubj(said-2, Enough-1)
root(ROOT-0, said-2)
